title: Mathew Knowles Offering One-Day Bootcamp For Beyonce Wannabes
text:
Mathew Knowles Offering One-Day Bootcamp For Beyonce Wannabes Mathew Knowles Offering One-Day Bootcamp For Beyonce Wannabes Beyonce Knowles Mathew Knowles Destiny's Child 
Do you want to be just like Beyoncé? Well now you can, Beyonce’s father and former manager is offering a $199 boot-camp all about getting into the entertainment industry. 
Beyoncé’s dad, Mathew Knowles , is offering a one-off lesson on how to become just like his superstar daughter. Knowles, who managed Destiny’s Child and later his daughter in her solo career, will be offering a one day talk on how to make it big in the music industry. Beyonce at Vanity Fair 's 87th Oscars party in L.A., February 2015. 
Read More: Jay Z, Beyonce And Other Pop Stars Sue Paris Clothing Retailer. 
Knowles will be speaking at ‘The Entertainment Industry: How do I get in?’ talk at the Hobby Center for Performing Arts in Houston, Texas on 24th October. The seminar is aimed at ‘all aspiring singers, dancers, composers, writers, producers, managers, publicists, attorneys, business managers and all other entertainment industry hopefuls.’ 
So, what can you expect to gain from the class? We’re hoping there will be some helpful hints on how to master Beyoncé’s fabulous walk and legendary booty shaking. However, the reality may be considerably less glamourous. 
The boot-camp also feature talks from industry lawyers, executives, managers and songwriters. It promises that it’ll save the audience plenty of time and money as Knowles will tell you everything it took him ‘20 years and thousands of dollars to learn firsthand.’ 
At the end of the session, audience members will receive a certificate of completion and a handy booklet with all the information and contacts you need to get into the industry. 
If you have hopes of one day rivalling Beyoncé’s estimated $450 million net worth, then you’ll have to make a small investment in return for Knowles’ advice. His advice is available at the low, low price of $199 for the session.
